contents.appointmentReminder: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, this is @user.firstName@. Our meeting will start in @gapMinutes@ minutes; to join, click: @chatLink@
contents.appointmentRequest: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, It's @user.firstName@ from Laguna. Click below to schedule your next meeting: @appLink@
contents.appointmentUser: Hello @user.firstName@, an appointment has been added to your schedule on @appointment.start@
